articles.title: Somaliland: Why has Israel recognised the breakaway African state as independent? - BBC
articles.description: Somaliland wants international recognition - here's why, and what could have driven Israel to recognise it now.
articles.content:
Ameyu Etana,BBC Afaan Oromooand
Residents of Somaliland's capital city, Hargeisa, have been celebrating Israel's declaration
Israel has taken the controversial decision to recognise the breakaway s… [+8079 chars]
